title: New Client Not Working
body: The old client works perfectly for me, but the new client never seems to work. I've tried the full repair option but it didn't fix the problem. I've configured my DNS as well and it didn't solve the problem either.

replies.body: What do you mean exactly by not working?  Are there any error messages?  I'd really like to help but I don't really have details on what you're seeing and when.  Let me know!

new client is not working for me whenever i launch the game. it doesnt even want to load or give a massage i uninstall , reinstall and run as admin its been like this ever since the new client patch.{{summoner:6}}

> [{quoted}](name=IceNinjaYT,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=4YAFyi4P,comment-id=0031,timestamp=2017-04-25T04:30:27.975+0000)
>
> Go to your League of Legends folder (typically "C: > Riot Games > League of Legends") 

>Look for "lol.launcher.admin" afterwards and launch it.

>Let us know if this works.
it doesnt work i tried everything.
It tells me that I am offline and to swap to the legacy client.
You need to redownlaod "bugsplt.dll" that's the issue with the game...

RIOT YOU GUYS ARE TRASH.. AFTER THE NEWEST PATCH MY LOGIN PAGE WONY OPEN WTF RIOT rly. IT DOESNT SAY ANYTHING AFTER TH LEAGUE OF LEGEND LOGO POPS AND DISAPEARS.{{summoner:32}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

My new client freezes up and attempts to reconnect all the time. This is why I uninstalled the new one when it first came out and used the old client till I had to update... but it doesn't work is there a fix for me?

I cannot even launch the new client after updating it. when I press launch on the launcher the LoL logo pops up on my desktop but then doesn't launch the login screen. I have uninstalled and reinstalled many times. and ran as an administrator but still doesn't work. I have done full repair as well but doesn't work. I had the beta client before but when a launched it, it pops up as a white screen where the beta launcher should be and happens every time when I open it from its file location. overall I cannot play league at all

[Granting League permission to run on your computer should do the trick!](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)

http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Annie_3.jpg

> [{quoted}](name=NightFlamingo757,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=du4UdBb3,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-04-24T22:31:52.392+0000)
>
> I cannot even launch the new client after updating it. when I press launch on the launcher the LoL logo pops up on my desktop but then doesn't launch the login screen. I have uninstalled and reinstalled many times. and ran as an administrator but still doesn't work. I have done full repair as well but doesn't work. I had the beta client before but when a launched it, it pops up as a white screen where the beta launcher should be and happens every time when I open it from its file location. overall I cannot play league at all

Same,and QUIT SAYING GRANT IT PERMISSION,everyone is having the same problem if it were that simple nobody would be complaining. Great job again RIOT,how about an actual fix ?
